text: Wisdom is not found in having all the answers, but in asking the questions no one dares to ask.
author: Paul

text: The strongest minds are not those that resist change, but those that learn from it.
author: Paul

text: A moment of silence teaches more than an hour of careless speech.
author: Paul

text: True wisdom is the courage to admit when you are wrong and the strength to grow from it.
author: Paul

text: Knowledge fills the mind; wisdom shapes the heart.
author: Paul

text: To walk in wisdom is to walk with patience, for haste often blinds the eyes.
author: Paul

text: The wise build bridges with words, while the foolish build walls with pride.
author: Paul

text: Wisdom is not in knowing the path, but in walking it with humility.
author: Paul

text: A wise person listens twice as much as they speak, for silence carries more weight than noise.
author: Paul

text: The greatest wealth is wisdom, for it cannot be stolen, lost, or wasted.
author: Paul

text: Pride speaks loudly, but wisdom whispersâ€”and only the attentive hear it.
author: Paul

text: Every mistake is a teacher; wisdom is the lesson you choose to keep.
author: Paul

text: Wisdom is not an age you reach, but a choice you make daily.
author: Paul

text: When you chase applause, you lose wisdom; when you chase truth, wisdom finds you.
author: Paul

text: Wisdom plants roots in patience and blooms in understanding.
author: Paul
